thread.title: Motorcyclist seriously hurt after striking deer on I-94 - Chicago Tribune
thread.title_full: Motorcyclist seriously hurt after striking deer on I-94 - Chicago Tribune

author: Chicago Tribune staff
title: Motorcyclist seriously hurt after striking deer on I-94 - Chicago Tribune
text:
A man was seriously hurt after his motorcycle struck and killed a deer on the Edens Expressway near north suburban Northfield early Thursday morning.
The man was driving a motorcycle in the southbound lanes of Interstate 94 when he struck a deer near Willow Road around 12:20 a.m., according to Illinois State Police.
The man, whose exact age was not available, was taken in serious condition to Advocate Lutheran General Hospital. The deer died as a result of the crash, police said.
Southbound lanes of I-94 were reopened at about 5:30 a.m.
